



日立 EHV 系列(UDP)(一条语句最多读取60个)

(0 - 7FFF)
WM0 10
	00 01 ff ff 00 00 a4 0a 0c 00 00 00 0c 00 00 01 0c 00 00 02 0c 00 00 03 0c 00 00 04 0c 00 00 05 0c 00 00 06 0c 00 00 07 0c 00 00 08 0c 00 00 09
	00 02 ff ff 00 00 a4 0a 0c 00 00 00 0c 00 00 01 0c 00 00 02 0c 00 00 03 0c 00 00 04 0c 00 00 05 0c 00 00 06 0c 00 00 07 0c 00 00 08 0c 00 00 09
	00 03 ff ff 00 00 a4 0a 0c 00 00 00 0c 00 00 01 0c 00 00 02 0c 00 00 03 0c 00 00 04 0c 00 00 05 0c 00 00 06 0c 00 00 07 0c 00 00 08 0c 00 00 09
	00 04 ff ff 00 00 a4 0a 0c 00 00 00 0c 00 00 01 0c 00 00 02 0c 00 00 03 0c 00 00 04 0c 00 00 05 0c 00 00 06 0c 00 00 07 0c 00 00 08 0c 00 00 09
WM1000 5
	00 01 ff ff 00 00 a4 05 0c 00 10 00 0c 00 10 01 0c 00 10 02 0c 00 10 03 0c 00 10 04
WM4096 5
	00 01 ff ff 00 00 a4 05 0c 00 40 96 0c 00 40 97 0c 00 40 98 0c 00 40 99 0c 00 40 9a

WN0 10
	00 01 ff ff 00 00 a4 0a 20 00 00 00 20 00 00 01 20 00 00 02 20 00 00 03 20 00 00 04 20 00 00 05 20 00 00 06 20 00 00 07 20 00 00 08 20 00 00 09
